elements.name: User could register with valid data

steps.name: user goes to register page
user enters valid data
user click on register option
user should register successfully
registration completion message should appear

name: F01_Registration | user register to e-commerce website

elements.name: User could log in with valid email and password

steps.name: user goes to login page
user enters "aessam@gmail.com" and "123456"
user click on login button
user should be login successfully
user go to the home page

elements.name: User should not log in with invalid email and password

steps.name: user enters "ali@gmail.com" and "wrongPassword"
user click on login button
user should not login successfully

name: F02_Login | user login to e-commerce website

elements.name: User could reset his/her password successfully

steps.name: user goes to login page
user click on forgot password
user enters his registered email
press on Recover button
user should reset his password successfully

elements.name: user enters "aessam@gmail.com" and "123456"
Logged user could search using product name

steps.name: user click on search box and write "book"
user press on the search button
"book" should appear successfully

elements.name: user enters "aessam@gmail.com" and "123456"
Logged user could search using product name

steps.name: user click on search box and write "laptop"
user press on the search button
"laptop" should appear successfully

elements.name: user enters "aessam@gmail.com" and "123456"
Logged user could search using product name

steps.name: user click on search box and write "nike"
user press on the search button
"nike" should appear successfully

elements.name: user enters "aessam@gmail.com" and "123456"
Logged user could search for product using sku

steps.name: user click on search box and write "SCI_FAITH"
user press on the search button
user click on the product in search result
"SCI_FAITH" should appear successfully in product page

elements.name: user enters "aessam@gmail.com" and "123456"
Logged user could search for product using sku

steps.name: user click on search box and write "APPLE_CAM"
user press on the search button
user click on the product in search result
"APPLE_CAM" should appear successfully in product page

elements.name: user enters "aessam@gmail.com" and "123456"
Logged user could search for product using sku

steps.name: user click on search box and write "SF_PRO_11"
user press on the search button
user click on the product in search result
"SF_PRO_11" should appear successfully in product page

name: F04_Product Search | user search for product

elements.name: Logged User could choose US currency

steps.name: user click on the currency selector and choose the US currency
US dollar symbol is chosen and displayed on all products

elements.name: Logged User could choose Euro currency

steps.name: user click on the currency selector and choose the Euro currency
Euro symbol is chosen and displayed on all products

name: F05_Switching Currencies | user switch between US and Euro currencies

elements.name: Logged user could hover on different sub categories

steps.name: user select random one of the three main categories
